segments.text: It's the latest and quite popular among young people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know and I like it very much . I will take it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long is this cell phone guaranteed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can refund it in 7 days and exchange it in one year .
segments.speaker: S1
